sections.description: Transform your WordPress blog into a link blog with automatic domain extraction for clean, professional link attribution.
sections.installation: Download and install through WordPress admin, or upload the plugin files to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
sections.changelog:
1.3.0

  • Major Security Overhaul: CSRF protection, input validation, capability checks, secure URL handling
  • Modern Architecture: Complete refactor with PSR-4 autoloading, dependency injection, separation of concerns
  • Enhanced Security: Comprehensive sanitization, nonce verification, secure GitHub updater
  • Performance Improvements: Optimized loading, efficient database queries, transient caching
  • Developer Features: PHPDoc documentation, hooks & filters, clean uninstall
  • WordPress Standards: Following all WordPress best practices and coding standards

1.2.5

  • Complete admin interface redesign with modern card-based layout
  • Organized settings into logical sections
  • Enhanced sidebar with quick guide, changelog, and support
